However effect PEEP anesthetize patient mask-ventilation poorly investigate . In order investigate phenomenon , four group patient compare preoxygenation mask ventilation anesthesia induction . Each group consist 30 patient pre-oxygenated mask ventilate different CPAP/PEEP level different driving pressure . Time open airway measure number respiratory cycle detection CO2 capnograph .
DOC.criteria: 1 . ≥ 18 ≤ 65 year male female . 2 . Elective surgery general anesthesia 3 . ASAclassification 13 4 . Signed date informed consent 1 . BMI > 30 2 . Predicted difficult maskventilation 3 . Known hiatus hernia GERD
